ability.name: Crisis Averted
ability.description: * When you draw The Tower, perform all of the usual steps of Catastrophe, _but_: * Instead of ending your turn immediately afterwards, instead draw 3 cards (Wise: 4, Foolish: 2) and play them as if they were in your hand.
ability.flavor: "I don't think of it as a mistake, it's more of a happy accident."
